repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This manuscript contains Aṃsa 6 of the Śivarahasya.

msItem.title: Śivarahasya. Aṃsa 6

filiation.p: Shiva Rahasya Vol. 6 By Bhairo Prasad Pathak Sanskrit Manuscript Jangamwadi Math Collection (uploaded on Archive org. Devanagari ms.) New Catalogus Catalogorum vol 34 pp: 155-160 VOHD II.7.2486:p-887

msItem.incipit: 1v 1 śrīrastu hemādriṃ kilamātuliṅgamityādā 1v 2 ya modādhiko moḍhyānnākanivāsināṃ bhayaparairvākyai 1v 3 riva prārthitaḥ . nīlīśaṃbaranīlamabaratalaṃ jaṃbuṛalaṃ bhāvayan 1v 4 taṃ muñcan girimaṃbaraṃ parimṛśaṃ laṃbodaraḥ pātu māṃ . vāmam yasya
msItem.explicit: 182r 4 bhya dadyānnavibhaidyametat . itthaṃ sutavacodyatamahānandaikamodaprabhābhāsvatbhāskaraprabhāmunivarāḥ santu 1 82r 5 ṣṭuvuḥ taṃ tadā vedodyavacanāśiṣāprahṛṣitā sutañjayetyam puradyāhojagmurativaharṣitahṛdāviśveśvaraṃ 182r 6 vikṣītuṃ
msItem.finalRubric:
182r 6 . iti śivarahasye ṣaṣṭhāṃśe śivagaurīsaṃvāde pañcāśodhyāyaḥ .. śivarahasyaṣaṣṭhāṃśaṃ graṃtha
182r 7 graṃthasaṃkhyai uta 930. …. śivārpaṇamastu tripurasundarisabhārya . samāptaṃ karakṛtamaparādhaṃ kṣantumarhanti santaḥ

extent.measure: 6 blank folio, 2 wooden guard folio and 182 written

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numeration in the left margin on the verso of the folio.

additions.desc: On 1v in the left margin is written hariḥ oṃ.

listBibl.bibl: Śivarahasyam Thanjavur Sarasvati Mahal Series 1992 -2006, edi by Sri Krishnamurthy Sastri Senior Pandit Sri Sarasvati Mahal Library Tanjavur.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words.
